name: Hamster Home
description:
Hamster Home is a short walking game that is part of the Animals series.

This is a very simple game in memory of my hamsters. It was done back in time in early 2017, shortly after Eldamar died. Actually, he loved being inside the cage, when I took him out, he wanted to return inside. It was his home. So I just had this idea. The long thing is supposed to be a paper tube, and the balls are just toys to play. With the update of 2021, I have added photos of Minireth and Nuada, and a wooden house, since Nuada had one to live in too. Rest in peace my friends.

This game was developed with Unity.

Move with the wasd and jump with space. Move the camera with the mouse. Have fun with the balls and I hope you enjoy the cute pictures of my past hamsters.

Go back to Animals
